choices.text: I've been told about some prank you want to play on me.
I know the type of guy you are.

prank.text: I'm kind of a prankster, but take it easy.

ask.text: Why don't we start all over again?

distrust.text: You're the type of guy that takes advantage of everyone.
Looking for a fight no matter the reason.

distrustReply.text: If you're done pestering me, get away you tosser.

normal.text: Are you still angry about the seat thing?

normalReply.text: We'll see. What about you? Do you already know which is your desk?

warn.text: By the way, Alex was talking before about pulling a prank on you.
He didn't use to be like that, I don't know what's going on with him.

talked.text: Let's get in or we'll be late.

match.text: We're meeting this Saturday to watch a film at my place.
Do you want to come? Some classmates are coming.
And we'll watch it in the huge TV my dad's just bought to watch football.

choices.text: I have to ask my parents first.

yes.text: Great, another joins the team then.
I'll let you know the address and the rest of the details.

reminder.text: Remember, Saturday at my house at 6PM.
